Subject: Re: [junit] Testing constructors?



*
Pico Geyer wrote:
> I was just wondering what was the common practice on testing
> constructors.

You should test everything that could possibly break. If they
can't
break, don't test them. If they can, do.


> Should they be tested. If not why not?
>

Only if you want them to work.


Kevin.
